1381770.name: Fortune Summoners: Secret of the Elemental Stone
1381770.description:
In a world where magic has become a part of everyday life through the use of Elemental Stones, young girls set out together on a small adventure—one that will ultimately guide them into a world beyond their imagination.

Fortune Summoners is a 2D side-scrolling action RPG featuring a vast world and intelligent AI-controlled companions who fight and move on their own. This game is single-player only.

Key Features:

  • A massive gameworld to explore - nearly a dozen dungeons to delve into, and easily 25+ hours of gameplay, with lots of extra content to explore!

  • Gorgeous, detailed 2D sprite backgrounds and animations - like the best 16-bit game you never got to play!

  • Classic platformer-RPG action in the vein of some of the true greats of yesteryear!

  • Conquer the challenges before you with intelligent AI companions - you can let them do as they want or customize their behavior to your heart's delight!

  • A nostalgic story, hand-drawn illustrations, and high-quality music and sound!

Streaming / Video Policy:

You are free to stream and upload videos of this game on platforms such as YouTube, Twitch, and other streaming services.

Monetization is allowed.

Important Notice Regarding the English Version:

The English version can only be launched from the Steam client.

Please start the game from the Steam client and select the English version when prompted.

Note:

The English version of this game was previously translated and published by Carpe Fulgur. However, Carpe Fulgur has since officially dissolved.

As a result, the English version is now being published directly by Lizsoft.

We would like to express our sincere gratitude to Carpe Fulgur for their dedication and passion in bringing this game to players around the world.
